Containers.Description: [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Description[/span][/u][/b][br] Roon builds you an interconnected digital library using your files (NAS, hard drives, iTunes, etc.) and streaming music (TIDAL, Qobuz, live radio, etc.). It provides enhanced, up-to-date metadata, which is then displayed in an amazing interface enriched with content.[br][br] Roon extracts the best sound quality from your audio equipment by ensuring bit-perfect delivery, as well as giving you access to powerful DSP for a customized listening experience.[br][br] Take control of your system. With Roon, you’ll rediscover old favorites and find new music you love. Explore the world of music as you listen, precisely tailored to your tastes.[br][br] Roon Server is a headless application and is used in conjunction with Roon or Roon Remote, both of which provide control functionality.[br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/data[/b] This is where Roon will store it's configuration data.[br] [b]/music[/b] This is where Roon will scan for media files.[br][br] [b]/app[/b] This is where the Roon application files will be stored.[br][br] [b]/backup[/b] This is where you will backup your Roon configuration.[br][br]
